title: Paul Irish - The Mobile Web is Dying and Needs Your Help - BDConf, April 2013
description:
Paul Irish is Developer Advocate for Chrome. He's thinking a lot about how to make you more productive with tools that improve your workflow and assist your web app development.
Paul Irish is a front-end developer who loves the web. He is a Developer Advocate for Google Chrome by day. He develops Yeoman, the HTML5/CSS3 feature detection library Modernizr, HTML5 Boilerplate, HTML5 Please, CSS3 Please, and other bits and bobs of open source code.
